alert.note: Alert for Cobb; Douglas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 6:56PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Cobb and northeastern Douglas Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 655 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Powder Springs, or 7 miles northeast of Douglasville, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Douglasville, Smyrna, Powder Springs, Austell, Lithia Springs, Sweetwater Creek State Park, Six Flags Over Georgia, Lost Mountain Park, Vinings, Jim R Miller Park and Mableton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
